Hello,  
  
First I want to greet to everybody because I am new in this gro=
up.  
I will have to do some automatic tests of an application developed in=

swt. I have been looking for and I have found the abbot framework.
Initial=
ly something that it is not possible to do with abbot  is
generate a report=
 after executing the scripts that have been created
with the capture action=
.
Somebody knows another framework that generates script of tests with
swin=
g and swt applications and show a report of the result?
  
Thanks and regar=
ds,  
Juan Carlos.
